altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

title.en: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito VS. Kyougoku Natsuhiko

altTitles.en: Bungo Stray Dogs: Another Story: Yukito Ayatsuji vs. Natsuhiko Kyogoku

altTitles.ru: Великий из бродячих псов: Аяцудзи Юкито против Кёгоку Нацухико

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス外伝 綾辻行人VS.京極夏彦

altTitles.uk: Літературні генії - бродячі пси: Гайден інша історія

description.en: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!
description.ru: Аяцудзи Юкито, известный как «Детектив-убийца», который вследствие своей опасной способности находится под наблюдением Цудзимуры Мизуки, агента-новичка из Особого отдела по делам одаренных. Аяцудзи просят раскрыть дело об убийстве, однако за кулисами стоит его заклятый враг, Кёгоку Нацухико, который дергает за ниточки...?!

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ステイナイト ヘブンズフィール

description.en:
The story takes place in an ordinary Japanese town, Fuyuki City. Hidden from society, there has been a deadly war going on in this town. Seven sorcerers known as "Masters" summon powerful familiars called "Servants," and they all fight each other until the last one. The last one is said to attain the Holy Grail, which will grant them a wish. Only few know when this War started and what the Holy Grail is, but the war is about to begin again this year.  
  
The main character is Emiya Shirou, who lost his parents in a fire and was adopted by a man who called himself a mage. Admiring his stepfather, he has been training himself to be a mage. However, he had no talent and he could barely use even one type of magecraft. His stepfather has already passed away, and today he's a mage without any skills or knowledge. He is involved in the Holy Grail War when he accidentally summons Saber, who is said to be the strongest Servant of all…  
  
Heaven's Feel is one of the routes in Fate/stay night. The heroine of this route is Matou Sakura.
description.es: 10 años después de la Guerra del Santo Grial, una batalla librada por Maestros y Sirvientes por el recipiente que concede los deseos, el Santo Grial, estalla otra guerra en la ciudad de Fuyuki. Shirou Emiya, el hijo adoptivo de Kiritsugu Emiya, participante de la Guerra del Santo Grial anterior, lleva una vida pacífica con sus seres queridos. Especialmente cerca de él está su estudiante de primer año Sakura Matou, quien trae bondad a su vida solitaria. Pero una vez que comienza la Guerra del Santo Grial, la vida pacífica de Shirou se rompe.
description.ru: Действие разворачивается в обыкновенном японском городке Фуюки. В нем проходит смертельная война, скрытая от общества. Семеро магов, Мастеров, призывают души великих героев прошлого, называемых Слугами, которые сражаются между собой. Последний оставшийся обретет Святой Грааль, способный выполнить желание. Лишь некоторые знают про эту войну и Святой Грааль, но в этом году война начинается вновь.Главный герой - Эмия Широ, потерявший родителей в пожаре и усыновленный человеком, называвшим себя магом. Восхищаясь отчимом, он тренируется чтобы стать чародеем, однако, не обладая талантом, он едва ли может использовать один вид магии. Его отчим умер, и сегодня Широ маг без каких-либо умений и знаний. Он становится участником Войны Святого Грааля, когда случайно призывает Сэйбер - сильнейшую из Слуг…Манга-адаптация "Heaven's Feel" - одного из рутов в эроге "Fate/stay night" от компании Type-Moon. Героиня рута - Мато Сакура.

altTitles.en: Appmon
Digimon Universe

altTitles.ja: デジモンユニバース アプリモンスターズ

description.en:
Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters," or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act, and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space to allow people and the system to interface and function. But in the vast sea of the internet, the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system, thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net.  
  
The protagonist, Haru Shinkai, is led to acquire the Appli Drive, and uses it to materialize Gacchimon, a search app monster. What is the secret hidden within the Appli Drive? What is the mysterious field that exists between net world where the Appmon exist, and the real world? What is the "App Combine" that can combine two Appmons? What is Leviathan's true goal?

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...
description.ja:
可愛すぎる女体化男子の恋の行方は――！？

上杉ケースケの悩みは男子なのに小さくて可愛いこと。ある日、片想いの相手・のえるが「上杉が女の子だったらめっちゃ可愛くない!？」と話しているのを聞いてしまう。

「オレ、男扱いもされてないってこと…!？」

幼なじみで何でもできる瑛人には、身長も勉強も勝てないし、失恋もしちゃうし…。落ち込むケースケが、家の隣の神社で恋がかなうようにお願いをしてみると、身体が女の子になっちゃって――!?

title.en: The Debt Collector Who's an Older Girl Takes Care of Me Little by Little

altTitles.ja: だんだん、借金取りの姉御がボクの世話を焼いてくれる

altTitles.ja-ro: Dandan, Shakkintori no Anego ga Boku no Sewa o Yaite Kureru

altTitles.es-la: La chica cobradora me cuida poco a poco.

description.en:
A collector girl finds a child while collecting a debt: his parents have escaped to avoid paying 
and now she unwillingly finds herself in charge of keeping him safe and taking care of him... 
everything to protect him rewards, everything for that!
description.es-la: Una chica cobradora que mientras se encuentra cobrando una deuda se encuentra con un niño, sus padres han escapado para no pagar y ahora ella se encargara de mantenerlo a salvo y cuidarlo... todo para proteger le recompensa, ¡todo por eso!

title.en: Sono Munou, Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou no Mahoutsukai ~Munou to Sagesumare, Kizokuka kara Oidasareta ga, Gift "Tenseisha" ga Kakusei shite Zense no Nouryoku ga Yomigaetta~

altTitles.ja: その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い　〜無能と蔑まれ、貴族家から追い出されたが、ギフト《転生者》が覚醒して前世の能力が蘇った〜

altTitles.en: That Incompetent is Actually the World's Strongest Wizard: He was Scorned as Incompetent and Kicked out of His Aristocratic Family, but His Gift of "Reincarnation" Awakened and Brought Back the Abilities of His Previous Life

description.en:
Alma, the third son of an aristocratic family who could not receive the Gift that should have been given by God, is despised as incompetent from his parents' home and is expelled from the house. However, in reality, Alma was given a special Gift - He regained the abilities of the previous life! With the Gift [Reincarnation], he becomes the strongest wizard in the world! Alma, who devoted all of his first life to the quest for magic, seeks a "happy second life" with the magic of his previous life!
___
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3823gm/)  (JP)
description.ja: この世界の人々は15歳になると、女神様から《ギフト》と呼ばれる様々な能力を与えられる。貴族家の三男・アルマも優秀な《ギフト》を授かることを期待されていたが、なぜか《ギフト》はまったく発現せず、実家から無能と蔑まれ追い出されてしまう…。だが、実はアルマは特別な《ギフト》を授かっていたーー。その能力《転生者》によって前世の記憶と能力を取り戻したアルマは、この世界で最強の魔法使いとなった！一度目の人生の全てを魔法の探究に捧げたアルマが、前世で極めた魔法で”幸せな二度目の人生”へと歩み出す！

altTitles.ja: 大悪党少年

altTitles.en: The Great Villainous Boy

description.en: The manga's story teases of a boy who thinks everything in the world is worthless: the heroes who pretend to fight with grace, his classmates who only know how to flock together, and his own weak, miserable self. That is why the boy aspires to be the lonely, solitary, and ultimate villain, to change himself and the world.

altTitles.en: Master's Corpse

altTitles.ja: ご主人様のしかばね

description.en: A maid-like spirit, “Step Girl,” who repeats distorted service and puts people at risk. There is only one way to annihilate them: "The master accepts his service." A boy who can not ignore the feelings of a person, Kimomi, is found as a "master" by a strange maid -Ursula.
description.ja: 歪んだ奉仕を繰り返し、人々を危険にさらすメイド姿の精霊“ステップガール”。彼女たちを消滅させる方法はただ一つ、「“ご主人様”が、その奉仕を受け入れてあげること」。人の気持ちを無視できない少年・言見は、見ず知らずのメイド・ウルスラに“ご主人様”として見出されてしまい――。

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl
Happy Life with my Girlfriend

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

description.en: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

title.en: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.

altTitles.en: I (♂) Cross-Dressed for the IRL (♀) Meetup

altTitles.ja: 女装してオフ会に参加してみた。

description.en: “Cocoa" has made three best friends in her monthly meetup group, where girls get together every month by meeting up at the cutest and trendiest new dessert cafes. Cocoa is in it for the sweets—really!—but she's also harboring a few secrets: Not only does Cocoa have a crush on another one of the girls in the group, Opera, but she's actually a guy named Satoshi who's been cross-dressing! During one meetup, things come to a head when Opera discovers that Cocoa is cross-dressing—and to Cocoa's surprise, Opera confesses that she is too! [Kodansha]

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

title.en: The Perfect Idol's Guide to Falling in Love

altTitles.vi: Cẩm Nang Thu Phục Idol Hoàn Mỹ

altTitles.en: Falling in Love For Real
The Perfect Idol's Handbook of Falling in Love

altTitles.zh-ro: Wán měi Ài Dòu Lún xiàn Shǒu cè

description.en: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopular even after three years together, suddenly announces their separation on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

title.en: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World

altTitles.en: Alluring Hunk in Women Wonderland
Transmigrated into a Feminist World

description.en: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"

altTitles.en: Isshiki-san Wants to Know About Love.
Fullmetal Rinna wants to XX

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

altTitles.ja: 異世界美少女受肉おじさんと

altTitles.en: Life with an Ordinary Guy Who Reincarnated into a Total Fantasy Knockout

altTitles.ru: Фантастический мир с обращённым в красавицу мужчиной и…

description.en:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However… will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
description.ja: モテない32歳会社員が、全裸の女神様の手によって、スパダリ風のイケメン親友と一緒に異世界転移！しかし女神様のイタズラか、転移後の肉体はなんと絶世の金髪美少女になっていて！？男の姿に戻るため、親友と共に魔王を倒す旅に出るが、あまりの美貌に行く先々でトラブルに巻き込まれてしまい……。
description.ru: Скучный мужчина вместе с его красивым лучшим другом были призваны в другой мир обнаженной богиней! Однако из-за озорства богини одного превратили в... невероятно красивую девушку?! Чтобы обратно вернуть своё тело, они должны отправиться в путешествие, чтобы победить Короля Демонов!! Да пускай начнётся романтическая комедия, наполненная полным безумием иного мира!
description.pt-br:
Hinata Tachibana, um trabalhador de escritório sitiado de 32 anos, e seu belo melhor amigo Tsukasa Jinguuji foram convocados para outro mundo por uma deusa nua. No entanto, por causa das travessuras da deusa, Tachibana foi transformada em uma garota bonita inigualável ?! Para recuperar seu corpo, ele tem que viajar com seu melhor amigo para derrotar o rei demônio !! 

No entanto... eles serão capazes de manter as mãos longe um do outro !? 

"Um homem mais velho que se tornou uma garota bonita" e "Um homem mais velho e bonito"! Deixe a loucura outra jornada mundial rom-com começar!!

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

title.en: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru

altTitles.ja: アンデッド・キング 〜底辺冒険者、魔物の力で進化無双〜

altTitles.en: Undead King ~A Low-Ranking Adventurer, With the Power of Monsters, Becomes Unbeatable~

altTitles.ja: 裏切られた冒険者、アンデッドとして蘇り無双する

description.en:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!

altTitles.ja: グリーンボックス

description.en: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. "Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?
description.ja: 何もない緑色の部屋で目覚めた男子高校生、瀬名。目の前には世界地図と1行の説明。『欲しい物を思い浮かべながら、滅ぼしたい国のボタンを押せ。当たりなら解放』徐々に追い詰められていく瀬名はついにボタンを押してしまう。果たして最後に生き残るのは瀬名か、人類か。

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

altTitles.en: Madara Girls Scramble

description.en:
In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.

A thrilling, over-the-top, and occasionally heartwarming tale of friendship. Hunt, hunt, hunt! A girly vampire action story!
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

altTitles.ja: ジャイアントキリング

description.en:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
description.pt-br: Giant Killing é um mangá que conta a história de um técnico de futebol, ex-jogador japonês, que luta para levar times amadores à vitória contra times campeões. Tatsumi Takeshi jogava profissionalmente no East Tokyo United, o ETU, e era louvado pelos torcedores por dar tudo de si e levar o time à vitória. Certo dia decide sair do Japão para treinar um time amador Europeu, e desde então é considerado “traidor” por alguns japoneses. Então, dois membros da equipe do ETU vão atrás do técnico para que ele treine o time onde um dia foi jogador, para tirar o time do fundo do poço.

title.en: Oshi ga Kounin Stalker ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 推しが公認ストーカーになりました

altTitles.ja-ro: Oshi ga Kounin Sutouka ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: My Favorite Idol Officially Became a Stalker!

altTitles.zh: 本命爱豆竟然是跟踪狂

description.en: Rooting for the super popular idol Moco Nanami is the reason for living for 17-year-old idol otaku Sora Amano. Lately, he's been worried because his belongings have been going missing. In the middle of this, Sora pursued and caught a suspicious person that was running away with his smartphone - but the identity of this person - is his favorite idol Moco Nanami!?!!?
description.ja: 大人気アイドル・七海モコを応援する事が生きがいのドルオタ・天野空17歳。彼は、最近身の周りの物が無くなっている事に悩まされていた。モコのライブ帰りにケータイを無くした事に気づき、一緒にいたオタ友のタクにかけてもらうと。後ろから着信音が鳴り響き、逃げ出す人影が!? 逃げた人影を追った先で空が見たものは、なんと七海モコだった!?

altTitles.en: My Wife Whom I Loved Dearly

altTitles.ja: 大好きな妻だった

altTitles.en: The Wife Whom I Loved Dearly
Vanguard YouthQuake

altTitles.ja: カードファイト！！ ヴァンガード YouthQuake

description.en:
"I Think it's time for me to stop...playing Vanguard." "You've Got to Grow out of this Kid's Game."
Sentatsu Meguru, a first-year high school student, was wondering whether or not to continue playing Vanguard when his childhood friends and classmates are starting to quit.
One day, the master of his favorite café takes him to a fight with his grandfather,Kuranaga Sanzou.
Through the fight, Sanzou asks him a question, which leads him to look into his own mind, and is naturally led to the answer.
"I love it so much, there's no way I can stop!"
Then, he awoke to a strange power that allowed him to see the unit and the light that was connected to it on the board.
Quake your Soul!! A new story that Leads you to Vanguard!

altTitles.en: Welcome to Japan, Elf-san.
Welcome to Japan, Elf-san!

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

altTitles.ja: 十二人の死にたい子どもたち

altTitles.en: 12 Suicidal Teens

description.en: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.
description.ja: [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%8D%81%E4%BA%8C%E4%BA%BA%E3%81%AE%E6%AD%BB%E3%81%AB%E3%81%9F%E3%81%84%E5%AD%90%E3%81%A9%E3%82%82%E3%81%9F%E3%81%A1)

altTitles.ja: メイドインアビス

description.en:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
description.ja:
隅々まで探索されつくした世界に、唯一残された秘境の大穴『アビス』。どこまで続くとも知れない深く巨大なその縦穴には、奇妙奇怪な生物たちが生息し、今の人類では作りえない貴重な遺物が眠っている。
「アビス」の不可思議に満ちた姿は人々を魅了し、冒険へと駆り立てた。そうして幾度も大穴に挑戦する冒険者たちは、次第に『探窟家』呼ばれるようになっていった。

アビスの縁に築かれた街『オース』に暮らす孤児のリコは、いつか母のような偉大な探窟家になり、アビスの謎を解き明かすことを夢見ていた。そんなある日、リコはアビスを探窟中に、少年の姿をしたロボットを拾い…？
description.ka: უზარმაზარი გამოქვაბულების სისტემა, რომელიც ცნობილია როგორც უფსკრული, არის ბოლო შეუსწავლელი ადგილი მსოფლიოში. არავინ იცის, რამდენად ღრმად მიდის ეს ტიტანური ორმო, დასახლებული უცნაური და გასაოცარი არსებებით და სავსე იდუმალი უძველესი რელიქვიებით, რომელთა დანიშნულება თანამედროვე ადამიანისთვის უცნობია. თამამი ავანტიურისტთა თაობები მიზიდული იქნა უფსკრულის იდუმალი სიღრმეებით. დროთა განმავლობაში მათ, ვინც საკმარისად გაბედულები გამოიკვლიეს სახიფათო ორმო, გახდნენ ცნობილი როგორც "დელვერები". ორთში, უფსკრულის პირას მდებარე ქალაქში, ცხოვრობს პატარა ობოლი, სახელად რიკო, რომელიც ოცნებობს გახდეს ისეთივე დიდი დელვერი, როგორც დედამისი იყო და ამოხსნას ორმოს დიდი საიდუმლო. ერთ დღეს, ბუნდოვანი სიღრმეების შესწავლისას, ის წააწყდება პატარა ბიჭს, რომელიც აღმოჩნდება, რომ რობოტია…
description.ru: Огромная пещерная система, известная как Бездна, является последним неисследованным местом в мире. В этой титанической яме обитают странные и удивительные существа. Она полна таинственных древних реликвий, предназначение которых неизвестно современному человеку. Поколения смелых авантюристов были затянуты загадочными глубинами Бездны. Со временем достаточно храбрые, чтобы исследовать опасную яму, стали известны как «Исследователи Бездны». В Оосу, городе на краю Бездны, живет маленькая сирота по имени Рико, которая мечтает стать великим пещерным налетчиком, каким была ее мать, и разгадать великую тайну ямы. Однажды, исследуя темные глубины, она натыкается на маленького мальчика, который оказывается роботом...
description.es-la: El enorme sistema de cuevas, conocido como El Abismo, es el último lugar inexplorado en el mundo. Nadie sabe que tan profundo es este agujero titánico, habitado por extrañas y maravillosas criaturas y lleno de misterio y reliquias antiguas de propósito desconocido para la humanidad. Generaciones de valientes aventureros han sido atraídos a las profundidades cripticas del Abismo. Con el paso del tiempo estos exploradores son conocidos como "Exploradores de las Profundidades". En Oath, el pueblo al borde del Abismo, vive una pequeña niña huérfana llamada Riko, que sueña con convertirse en una gran exploradora como su madre y descubrir los misterios del Abismo. Un día explorando las obscuras profundidades se encuentra con un niño, que resulta ser un robot...

altTitles.ja: おくれまして青春

description.en: Wakaba (20) is a college debutante who yearns for youth. When she goes out on Halloween dressed in her school uniform, she ends up going on a date with a high school boy named Tachibana!　But in fact, this boy is also a college student whose friend left him out of the date... In order to make Wakaba's dream come true, she is asked to continue going out with him on his Seifuku dates!

title.en: My Bias Gets On The Last Train

description.en:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!

altTitles.ja: 男をやめてみた～癌になったので女装して恋をすることにしました～

altTitles.en: I Quit Being a Man: Got Cancer so I Decided to Dress up as a Woman and Fall in Love

description.en:
*This story is based on true events.
One day, the main character, Nagisa Hajime, is suddenly diagnosed with cancer. With the little time they have left, they decide to live as themself. To do so, they decide to renounce the gender they were assigned at birth, male, and go out into the city. Nagisa then goes through a series of incidents and events they never experienced before. The author lays bare their soul as they recount their personal experiences in this great LGBT work.
description.ja: 『この物語は実話に基づいています―。』 突然、主人公・渚素（なぎさ　はじめ）を襲った癌という病気。 残された時間で彼が選んだのは「自分らしく生きる」というものだった。 男性という生まれた時に割り当てられた性別をやめて街に出ることで…今まで体験してこなかった事件が次々と渚に押し寄せる。 著者自らの体験を赤裸々に描いた極上のレインボーエンターテイメントコミック！

description.en:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

altTitles.en: A Classmate With Fierce Eyes

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: 七瀬さんの恋が異常

altTitles.en: Nanase-san's Crazy Love Obsession
Nanase's Love is Crazy

description.en: Takahashi met Nanase, a beautiful and seemingly innocent woman, on a dating app. They were steadily growing closer in their relationship until one day, when he goes to Nanase's house, he finds a shocking sight...?
description.vi: Takahashi đã gặp được Nanase, một cô gái dễ thương và trong sáng thông qua ứng dụng hẹn hò. Quan hệ của cả hai ngày càng tiến triển một cách tốt đẹp rồi bỗng dưng một ngày nọ Takahashi được Nanase mời tới nhà mình chơi và chứng kiến một cảnh tượng bất ngờ.

altTitles.ja: わからないです　吉田さん

altTitles.en: I Don't Know, Yoshida-san

altTitles.ru: Что же в голове у Ёсиды?

description.en:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
description.ja: 地味で取柄もない大学生の九十九。大学の講義を終え帰宅準備をしていると孤高の美女「吉田真魚」が通りかかる。九十九と吉田さんは親密な関係なのだが、吉田さんが無表情すぎてなかなか関係が進展しないのだった…。
description.ru:
Повседневная история отношений между двумя студентами, которые всё никак не могут перейти от статуса друзей к возлюбленным.
Ямада Цукумо - обычный ничем не примечательный студент университета. Когда после окончания лекции он уже собирался уходить домой, мимо прошла нелюдимая красивая девушка Мао Ёсида. На самом деле, их уже давно связывают интимные отношения, но они всё никак не могут продвинуться дальше, потому что Ёсида сама себе на уме.
description.es-la: Tsukumo, un estudiante universitario ordinario y sin muchos atributos destacables, vive su día a día con tranquilidad. Pero un dia despues de finalizar sus clases y prepararse para regresar a casa, se cruza con Yoshida Mao, una hermosa y solitaria joven apodada la "Sirena". Entonces, mientras los demás chicos murmuran a su alrededor, Yoshida llama a Tsukumo en secreto. Al encontrarse a solas, Yoshida se acerca a él de manera inesperada. La realidad es que Tsukumo y Yoshida tienen una relación un tanto cercana. Sin embargo, Tsukumo lucha por comprender la distancia romántica entre ellos debido a la inexpresividad de Yoshida, lo que les impide pasar de ser "amigos" a "novios". Así, Tsukumo vive una vida universitaria dulce pero agridulce, intentando navegar entre la amistad y el amor. ¡¡Una serie de Takahashi osamu, autor de Lust Geass!!

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

description.en: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽

**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

description.ja: 童貞高校生のゴトウが好きになったのはセックス大好きなギャル・アガワさん。ある日の放課後、彼女が同級生とセックスしているところを見てしまって──。
description.vi: Con đũy tình yêu đã dẫn nam chính của ta đi thích một gyaru lẳng lơ sẵn sàng làm nháy với bất cứ ai. Rồi anh main sẽ làm gì trước cái tình huống NTR nhưng không hẳn này? Khuyến cáo ko dành cho trẻ dưới 18 và các thanh niên không thích NTR. Đọc truyện này đừng lắp đầu trên vào làm gì (lắp đầu dưới thì OK).
description.es-la: Un virgen estudiante de secundaria, por casualidad descubre a la gal de la que se estaba empezando a enamorar teniendo sexo con otro estudiante.
description.pt-br: Uma Gal safada que deixa todo mundo transar com ela e um garoto virgem do ensino médio apaixonado por ela, mesmo depois de vê-la transar com seu colega de classe.

description.en: As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party. All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja: 勇者パーティの一員である主人公・セレスはある日、勇者ゼクトから突然のクビ宣告を受けてしまう。一人になったセレスは、身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。その奴隷市場で見かけたのは、奴隷として売られた勇者の母親である静子さんの姿で――？？
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!

title.en: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite

altTitles.ja: 迷子になっていた幼女を助けたら、お隣に住む美少女留学生が家に遊びに来るようになった件について
お隣遊び

altTitles.en: The Story of How a Beautiful Foreign Student Who Lives Next Door Started to Visit My House After I Helped a Lost Little Girl
After Coincidentally Saving the New Transfer Student's Little Sister, We Gradually Grew Closer

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo ni Natte Ita Youjou wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujou Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite

altTitles.pl: Opowieść o Tym, Jak Piękna Uczennica Zza Granicy Mieszkająca Po Sąsiedzku Zaczęła Odwiedzać Mnie W Domu, Po Tym Jak Pomogłem Zagubionej Małej Dziewczynce

altTitles.pt-br: A História de como Uma Linda Estudante Estrangeira que Mora ao Lado Começou a Visitar Minha Casa Depois que Ajudei Uma Menininha Perdida

description.en:
One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world."

However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

altTitles.en: Devil Hero

description.en: Prince of hell is searching for the person who summoned and turned him into a superhero. Prince needs to find that host and return back to his realm.

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Karate Survivor in Another World
Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!
